column4: how do i stop people from going on a web page like www.yahoo.com can i use iptables ?
if it's the only computer in the house iptables might do it.. not sure.. but your router will accept keywords and sites to block.. the issue is most routers only allow a small list.
pihhan if it's the only computer there is a program called dansguardian that will give content, ip, & website filtering..
you're really looking for a fight huh?
